a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Global primary plastic production by polymer, 1990 to 2019
Polymers are color-coded to indicate recyclability: green for widely recycled, blue for moderately recycled, orange
for limited recyclability, red for usually non-recycled, and violet for unknown recyclability.
